comments.body: These are separate fixes. Please move to their own commit.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +246,250 @@			"--authentication-skip-lookup", // to survive inaccessible extensions-apiserver-authentication configmap
			"--authentication-kubeconfig", brokenKubeconfig,
			"--authorization-kubeconfig", brokenKubeconfig,
			"--authorization-always-allow-paths", "/healthz,/metrics",
			"--kubeconfig", kubeconfig,

comments.body: This is lots of duplicated code. How does the variant looks like that works for both cases?

This PR only disables insecure serving in `kube-controller-manager`, `kube-scheduler` and `cloud-controller-manager` still have insecure serving enabled. 

I don't want to changge the tests that validates the insecure serving, so I wrote another function `testComponentWithSecureServing` that only validates the secure serving.
